body.name: LILLUSORY Women's Cardigan Sweaters 2023 Fall Oversized Open Front Button V Neck Lightweight Cardigans Knit Outerwear
features: 【ULTRA-SOFT & HIGH-QUALITY FABRIC】With buttery-soft material, LILLUSORY women's cardigan sweaters can give you cozy warmth without looking bulky. Whether you are go to work or lounging at home, these cardigan sweaters are the great choice when temperature drops. LILLUSORY cardigan sweaters for women will redefine your comfort zone in these fall and winter.

【CLASSIC & STYLISH CARDIGANS】Open front, v neck, long sleeve, button down, chic knitted, baggy slouchy style, solid plain color knitwear, oversized cardigans, warm knit coats, lightweight jackets for women. With an oversized design, this lightweight cardigan is friendly to all body types and helps you in building a charming outfit for any activitiy.

【VERSATILE STYLE】LILLUSORY oversized cardigans add extra flair to your everyday. These fall sweaters are perfectly teams with casual T-shirts, fashion crop tanks, classic jeans, leggings, pants, skirts, dresses and so on. And this open-front loose sweater is suitable for both casual occasions and formal events.

【MUST HIGHLY RECOMMENDED BRAND】LILLUSORY is a fashion brand that combines style, performance, fit, and comfort. The high-quality long sleeve cardigan sweater is both affordable and accessible, perfect for everyday leisure and many important occasions.

【GARMENT CARE】Machine wash recommended with a laundry bag, machine washable with like colors; please do not bleach; hang to dry. Please check for your size carefully from our size chart and no need to hesitate for all these outstanding products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This sweater is so soft! It’s very thick and well made. I haven’t washed it yet, but think it will do well on the gentle cycle. It runs big, but it’s supposed too. I could have ordered a size down and it would have been fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Oversized Sweater and Sexy Too
reviews.reviewText: I was a little weary to buy this, because I wanted it to fit, as shown, on the first model. I love oversized sweaters, but they aren’t exactly sexy. I’ve skipped over this sweater a LOT because I just knew the fit would be off. Well, I was totally wrong. It’s perfectly oversized without going up a size from what you’d normally wear. It’s sexy when worn as a regular sweater, but not inappropriate for most, it not all places. My husband appreciates it😉It can be dressed up or down, and is really flattering on me. I also have a tip on how to wear it like the first model: When you put it on and button it up, pull the shoulders of the sweater back. It creates the ‘high/low’ look, making it looked cropped, without it showing any skin. Also, while low cut, pulling the sweater’s shoulders back, you’re not showing cleavage (I’m a 36D).I absolutely love this sweater and I am purchasing another color. It’s so comfy, versatile, flattering, and high quality. For reference, I’m 5’6” and 155-160lbs. I ordered a medium, which again, it’s my normal size and is perfectly oversized, without swallowing you, so I don’t recommend sizing up, unless you want it REALLY oversized.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute cropped look
reviews.reviewText: Slightly oversized. Lightweight. Comfortable. Sleeves slightly short, maybe that is the look. Cropped an inch below the waist so no awkward clinging to the hips like most cardigans. Color not exactly as pictured. As with all sweaters hand wash, blot with towel, air dry if you want it to last

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fabulous Sweater & Kudo's to Amazon
reviews.reviewText: First of all, the sweater is great - my wife says, "it's so comfortable and well made. I LOVE IT." But beware - it runs BIG - so my wife had to drop two sizes to find the right fit (large to small!). And here's where Amazon gets kudos - it was a Christmas gift bought in early Nov., so it was beyond the 30 day exchange period. But Amazon helped us be able to connect with Lillusory and exchange it. THANK YOU Amazon!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Warm. Nice shape
reviews.reviewText: I loved this sweater a lot right out of the package. The fabric seemed high quality and the oversized boxy fit is very chic BUT it’s kind of already started pilling and I’ve only worn it twice. Haven’t washed yet, but idk how this will hold up

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute and fits great
reviews.reviewText: I usually buy a medium or large, and bought the medium in this sweater (36b/c). It fits great and I love the color. I bought the army green, then went back to buy the beige one. These are great over jeans. Not form fitting at all, fairly heavy material, and so far has been washing up great! I do wash and then hang to dry, just to avoid any pilling or pulls. It might do fine in the dryer, but I’d rather not chance it. Two thumbs up on this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Even better quality than GAP
reviews.reviewText: How fun to receive this cute ‘boyfriend’ style sweater, and I especially like the lovely quality!The fabric is really lux, smooth and doesn’t look like it will instantly pill up. It is a medium weight, neither too heavy or thin, with a shorter boxy style and large wooden buttons. Wear it buttoned or open like a regular cardigan :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Short and boxy
reviews.reviewText: This is not oversized, as in long, like the picture on the model they used. This is short and boxy. I think they may have used a generic model, because I keep seeing the same model, with the same oversized sweater under different manufacturers. I ordered a medium which is the size I usually wear and the sweater hits like upper hip part. Maybe if I ordered and XL, maybe the length would be longer, maybe. The quality of the sweater is great. It feels very high end and is very soft, but if you are looking for oversize, long sweater, this is not it. I have already started the process to return it.
